item.title: Pit signs for robotics competition
item.author: contact@wonyoungjang.org (Wonyoung Jang)
item.description: Pit signs At one of my past employers, we ran large robotics competitions. For one such competition, we customized and printed these “pit signs” for each team participating in the competition. The teams could then take them home at the end. I’ve templated these signs so anybody may create similar ones. Figma Design Kit
